attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.review: it’s horrible, my phone keeps glitching nonstop after getting this app it’s hard for me to even write this review because of how bad my phone is glitching from this app! IT CRASHES very often and i can’t even see anything on the app! i’m concerned it may be stealing info and overall NOT A GOOD APP!

attributes.title: ✨BUNKER BOY!!! ✨
attributes.review: this app is the WORST app ever. i couldn’t download it and when i did it took almost a month to download. i think this app needs a lot of work. it needs to be fix. but take your time. this app has a lot of bugs and takes up a lot of my storage. and i hate 45th ✨✨ grossss✨✨. and BLM.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is an absolute abomination! The constant glitching and the hours and hours of waiting for it to load is absolutely ridiculous! I expected better! Highly disappointed in this app which was made for the man to “Make America great again”.

attributes.title: Makes your phone glitch like CRAZY!
attributes.review:
This app is horrible from the minute I downloaded this app my phone began to GLITCH and SLOWDOWN. 
My screen kept freezing, nothing you pressed worked, and kept having ads pop in and out. What a waste of time and waste of an app!!🍊🍊🍊🍊

attributes.title: this is straight garbage
attributes.review: i opened the app and my phone started bugging out so i went to AT&T and they said they can’t fix my phone because of this stupid app and i have to reset my whole phone because of this i’m losing everything i hate this app

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: this app literally took ages to download and it sent a virus to my phone i needed to get a whole new phone bc it literally so bad!!!! it caused spiders to crawl out of my phone and they all bite me 😓😓😓 i ended up sending them to the white house 😛😛 hopefully trump feels my pain 😭😭😭😭😭literallt die already 😥😥😥🤟🤟🤟🤟 no one loves you ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️🤩🤩🤩🤩

attributes.title: WORST APP DON’T DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: IT TOOK FOREVER TO DOWNLOAD!!! After it did download it GLITCHED NON-STOP!! It created a virus on my phone and I lost all of my other apps and I couldn’t access ANYTHING. It took forever for my phone to be back to normal. I deleted it and still after I deleted it my phone continue to glitch and not work properly.  THIS APP GOT ME SO MAD😡😡😡😡😤😤😤😤😤

attributes.title: ew. do not download this app!
attributes.review: this app is the most disgusting and most disrespectful thing i've seen in my life. i am only 3 years old and had to see the most ugliest orange to be alive. don't get me wrong, i love oranges. but why is this orange trying to be president once again? i almost threw up from seeing the login screen. absolutely terrifying. it makes me sick how this orange thinks raping young kids is cute 😹😹 also homophobia and transphobia... not to mention racist. ahahaha if i hear one more trump 2020 i'm gonna go 6 feet under ground. much luv xoxo.

attributes.title: Please do not get
attributes.review: Literally the worst app ever it keeps freezing and nothing is work I ask my friends to download it to just to see if it was only my phone but no it was all 6 of them to please don’t get this app it’s literally the worst and a waste of space

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: This app took days to download and I have PERFECT Wi-Fi. When the app finally downloaded, it put a virus on my phone! Now I can’t open most of my apps and I have to go fix it at the Apple Store! 😡 All I wanted to do was learn more about my president! Never even think about downloading this horrible app!!
